identity.name: SignSync AI
identity.emotional_tone: Electric & Neon (Future/Tech) mixed with Organic (Human Connection)

rules: Use JetBrains Mono for any data values, confidence scores, or translation logs.

usage.primary: Use for 'Active Recognition' states, primary CTAs, and high-confidence matches.
usage.secondary: Use for 'Human' elements, translation history, and learning features.
usage.accent: Use for warnings, low confidence scores, or error states.
usage.background: Deep Zinc-950. Never pure black (#000000) unless for OLED optimization toggle.

textures.noise: Use a subtle SVG noise overlay on the main background to prevent banding and add tactility.

grids.landing: Mode A: Tetris Grid (Asymmetrical bento box)
grids.dashboard: Mode B: Control Room Grid (Dense, data-heavy, webcam-centric)

containers.webcam_stage: Aspect ratio 16:9 or 4:3. Must be the visual anchor. Use 'Tracing Beam' border effect when active.

buttons.primary: h-12 px-8 rounded-full bg-primary text-primary-foreground font-bold hover:scale-105 transition-transform
buttons.secondary: h-12 px-8 rounded-full border border-white/10 hover:bg-white/5 transition-colors

cards.style: bg-card/50 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/5 rounded-2xl p-6 hover:border-white/10 transition-colors

inputs.style: bg-black/20 border-white/10 focus:border-cyan-500/50 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-cyan-500/50 h-12 rounded-xl

motion.micro_interactions: Buttons scale 0.98 on click. Cards lift -2px on hover.
motion.page_load: Staggered fade-in up for all children elements.
motion.recognition_feedback: Instant border color change (Gray -> Cyan) when hand is detected.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure 4.5:1 contrast ratio for all text. Use APCA standards.
accessibility.aria: All icons must have aria-hidden='true' or descriptive labels. Video feed must have status announcements.

media.image_style: High contrast, cinematic lighting, diverse representation of signers.
media.video_style: Clean feed, no filters, high frame rate priority.

hero_element.concept: Abstract digital hands forming connections or nodes.
hero_element.fallback: High-quality 3D render image of a cybernetic hand.

hero_background.description: Man with hands on chest, emotional connection, dark background. Use with heavy overlay/gradient.

feature_recognition.description: Tech focus, smart ring/circuits. Represents the AI/Tech aspect.

community_section.description: Diverse group communicating. Represents the user base.

dictionary_placeholder.description: Generic signing hand for dictionary card backgrounds.

general: Implement the 'Cyber-Humanism' aesthetic: Dark mode, neon accents, glassmorphism.
Use 'Manrope' for all headings. Do NOT use Inter for headings.
Ensure the Webcam component is the visual centerpiece of the Dashboard.
Use the 'Tracing Beam' effect on the webcam container to show active state.
Strictly follow the 'Control Room' grid for the dashboard layout.

specific_files.tailwind_config: Update colors to match the 'colors' section. Add 'Manrope' to font family.
specific_files.index_css: Add the noise texture overlay to the body background.
specific_files.components: Customize Shadcn components to remove the default 'Vercel' look. Increase border radius to 'rounded-xl' or 'rounded-2xl'.

universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through layered design elements (z-index).
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
NEVER use 'transition: all'. Animate specific properties.
NEVER center align the App container globally.
Export components as named exports, pages as default exports.
